idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# plays chord sequence, each for four beats

# fade out, starting at volume 0.5 and ending at 0.4
# starts immediately with duration of 2 beats
with gain(value = [0.5, 0.4], beats = 2, start = 0):
    playNote([ 46, 50, 53, 57 ], beats = 4)
    playNote([ 45, 48, 52, 55 ], beats = 4)
    playNote([ 43, 46, 50, 53 ], beats = 4)

# starts immediately with duration of 1 beat
with gain(value = [0.5, 0.4], beats = 1, start = 0):
    playNote([ 41, 45, 48, 52], beats = 2)
    playNote([ 42, 45, 48, 51], beats = 2)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# Plays notes A#, A, and G for 4 beats
playNote(22, beats=4)
playNote(21, beats=4)
playNote(19, beats=4)

# Plays notes F and F# for 2 beats
playNote(17, beats=2)
playNote(18, beats=2)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# Waits for 15 beats
rest(15)

# Volume is reduced to half
# Loop: plays high hat number 4 for 4 x 1/4 beats
with gain(0.5):
    for i in range(4):  
        playNote(4, beats=0.25)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# volume of 0.7
with gain(0.7):
    # first set of four beats
    rest(1.5)
    playNote(70, beats=0.2)
    playNote(72, beats=0.8)
    playNote(70, beats=0.5)
    playNote(69, beats=0.5)
    playNote(67, beats=0.5)
    
    # second set of four beats
    playNote(69, beats=1.5)
    playNote(64, beats=1.5)
    playNote(65, beats=1)

    # third set of four beats
    playNote(62, beats=1.5)
    playNote(58, beats=1.5)
    playNote(57, beats=1)

    # fourth set of four beats
    playNote(60, beats=1.5)
    playNote(62, beats=0.6)
    playNote(62, beats=0.1)
    playNote(65, beats=0.8)

# fade out, starting at volume 1 and ending at 0.4
# starts immediately with duration of 1 beat
with gain(value = [0.5, 0.3], beats = 1, start = 0):
    playNote(62, beats=1)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# Loop: plays the following 4 times
for i in range(4):
    playNote(0) # 1 beat
    playNote(2) # 1 beat
    # Loop: plays kick number 4 for 2 x 1/2 beats
    for i in range(2):
        playNote(0, beats=0.5)
    playNote(2)
